misc: Operates the Hector organization's digital media properties
Gotten increasingly close to winning the Hector Trophée but hasn't quite gotten it done yet
biography: Lasse, a familiar face from Tapiola Golf, brings a unique blend of on-course skill and off-course expertise to the Hector Trophée. Beyond his participation, Lasse is the man behind the Hector organization's digital media properties.

A perennial contender, Lasse will be making his ninth appearance in Hector Trophée 2025. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, he has gotten increasingly close to securing the win and his relentless dedication and strategic acumen make him a formidable presence in every tournament.
